name: rdbg-date-formatter
description: Automatically formats Unix timestamps into human-readable dates while debugging Ruby code with the rdbg debugger

rdbg-date-formatter.minDate.description: Minimum integer of seconds since the Epoch that should be considered as a date. Default value is /**2000.01.01*/ == 946684800

rdbg-date-formatter.maxDate.description: Maximum integer of seconds since the Epoch that should be considered as a date. Default value is /**2071.09.08*/ == 2208988800

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
